5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin ‘Amr that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“No one properly understands who reads the Qur’an in less than three days.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ يُسْتَحَبُّ يُخْتَمُ الْقُرْآنُ
chapter.eng-name: How much (time) is recommended regarding the completion of the Qur’an
